abstract.t: This work describes an enhancement to SIP protocol for the interworkingwith QoS enabled IP networks. The proposed mechanism is simple and itfully preserves backward compatibility and interoperability with currentSIP applications. The draft describes also, as an example, theapplication of this mechanism to a particular QoS enabled IP network,which implements Diffserv as transport mechanisms and COPS as protocolfor QoS requests and for admission control.
